alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 22 at 2:15PM MDT until April 24 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MDT SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 75 mph. The higher winds and snowfall will occur over the northern end of the county. * WHERE...Johnson County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel likely to be very hazardous and dangerous, with road closures likely. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility to whiteout conditions.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
